Title: What is Full Spectrum Led Lighting?
Content: Full Spectrum LED Lighting from Shenzhen Xuancai Electronic Co., Ltd. encompasses a wide color temperature range (1700k-20000k), ensuring natural and vibrant illumination. With color rendering indices (RA80, RA95, RA98), our LEDs deliver accurate and vivid colors, providing an exceptional lighting experience.

Title: What is a COB LED Strip Light?
Content: A COB LED Strip Light by Shenzhen Xuancai Electronic Co., Ltd. features Chip on Board (COB) technology, offering a seamless, high-density light source for uniform brightness. With power options ranging from 3W to 500W, our COB LED strips provide versatile and energy-efficient lighting solutions.
